meanings.sent1: The dark forest was the uneasiest place for me to be alone.
meanings.sent2: The stormy weather made walking outside the uneasiest choice.
meanings.sent3: Trying to dance in flippers was the uneasiest thing I've ever attempted.
meanings.sent4: The uneasiest silence fell over the room as they awaited the results.
meanings.sent5: The uneasiest feeling crept up her spine as she entered the abandoned house.

meanings.sent1: The old chair was the uneasiest seat in the room.
meanings.sent2: Sleeping on the hard ground was the uneasiest experience for him.
meanings.sent3: Wearing shoes on the wrong feet felt like the uneasiest mistake.
meanings.sent4: The uneasiest bed in the hotel had springs poking out.
meanings.sent5: The uneasiest mattress he had ever slept on left him with a sore back.

meanings.definition: Lacking ease in manner or feeling
meanings.sent1: She had the uneasiest smile when meeting new people.
meanings.sent2: His uneasiest expression showed his nervousness during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The uneasiest wave goodbye came from the shyest person in the room.
meanings.sent4: The uneasiest laugh escaped her lips as she tried to cover her embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: His uneasiest walk indicated his discomfort in the unfamiliar surroundings.
